column10:
1) Raiding the convoy has linked Lord Yabu, a powerful Daiymo, to Kage-sama's
2) The team discusses further plans. Hayato collects his pay.
3) Mugen wants to work with Yuki to test her skills.
The team plans their next move in a tavern.
EN
column12: Simplified Chinese

column10: Safe House
column12: 安全屋

column10: Not a bad place you have here.
column12: 你这地方不赖啊。

column9: standing at a table with maps and documents
column10: Come, come look at this.
column12: 来，看看这个。

column10: Our investigations show that the transport passed through the town of Imai, before it entered the Nakasendō route.
column12: 从掌握的情报来看，运输车队是先经过今井镇然后进入中山道的。

column10: Guess you can't just question the local lord? Find out who's behind this?
column12: 我猜你不会只问当地领主几个问题就完事？是想查出幕后黑手？

column10: I fear it is not that simple. Lord Yabu rules this area, a powerful daimyo who's shown little love for the Shogun since the end of the war.
column12: 恐怕事情没那么简单。这一带是薮领主的势力范围，此人实力雄厚，战后对将军就表现出不满了。

column10: Could be your Kage-sama. Want me to go to Imai town? Must be cold there this time of year.
column12: 没准幕后就是那位影大人。要我去趟今井镇吗？那地方现在一定很冷。

column10: I will handle this one myself. Please tell Yuki-chan to come and see me.
column12: 这事我亲自处理。麻烦转告友希妹妹来见我。

column10: No need. She's already at the door.
column12: 不用转告了。她就在门口。

column10: Is she now?
column12: 她在门口？

column10: I-I wasn't listening! I swear!
column12: 我-我可没偷听！我发誓！

column10: Easy, Yuki-chan.
column12: 没事，友希妹妹。

column10: Hayato-san, talk to the man outside, he will give you your first payment.
column12: 隼人先生，你可以找屋外那人领你的头笔佣金。

column10: Teh … see you.
column12: 嗯……回见。

column10: Where is he going? Can't I go with him?
column12: 师傅要去哪？我不能和他一起去吗？

column9: "expertise" means that she is a thief
column10: I would rather have you with me, Yuki-chan. Your "expertise" will no doubt be useful on this mission.
column12: 你这次跟我走，友希妹妹。鉴于你的"身手"，此次任务非你莫属。

column10: Huh … what mission?
column12: 哈，……什么任务？

column10: A small theft. If you handle it well, you will be welcomed into our group, and I will ask Hayato-san if he will consider teaching you.
column12: 偷点东西。假如你圆满完成任务，就能成为我们队里一员，另外我还会让隼人先生收你为徒。

column10: Really?! … then … I will show you my best, master samurai!
column12: 真的？!……太好了……我会全力以赴的，武士大人。

column10: As you should. Now, let me tell you the plan.
column12: 很好。现在我把计划告诉你。

column10: Mugen and Yuki have just arrived in Imai town. They watch from a side alley as hostile soldiers patrol the streets.
EN
column12: EN3

column10: Imai town
column12: 今井镇

column10: Soldiers … they're not from here.
column12: 士兵……而且不是镇里的士兵。

column10: Agreed. I doubt they belong to the city watch.
column12: 确实如此。我怀疑他们是警备营的。

column10: Now, remember what we have come here to do.
column12: 切记我们此行的目的。

column10: Break into the district office, find the important man and steal papers from him.
column12: 潜入公所内，找到目标人，偷走他身上的文件。

column10: Very good. I suspect you will have to do some pickpocketing before this is done.
column12: 非常好。不过在完成任务之前你还得偷点东西。

column10: Also take this. I asked Hayato-san to make it for you.
column12: 把这个带上，我让隼人先生给你做的。

column10: That's … a hookshot! Thank you, master samurai!
column12: 这是……抓勾!谢谢你，武士大人!

column10: Now, let us begin. The district office is just ahead. We should avoid the main streets.
column12: 现在开始行动。区公所就在前面，我们得绕过主街。

column10: I want you to be my scout. Stick to the rooftops; I will follow down below. If there is trouble, you can warn me ahead of time.
column12: 侦察交给你了。你走屋顶，我在下面跟着。假如遇到麻烦，你就能提前通知我。

column10: I want you to be my scout. See what you can find out about the official, then return to me.
column12: 侦察交给你了。打探一下官员的信息，然后回来。

column10: Hai, master samurai!
column12: 是，武士大人。

column9: Yuki runs off and uses the hookshot, Mugen enters a nearby alley
column10: Meet me at the sake brewery when you are done. Now, let us begin.
column12: 侦察完成后到清酒厂会合，现在开始行动。

column10: Meet me at the western shrine when you are done. Now, let us begin.
column12: 侦察完成后到西面神龛处会合，现在开始行动。

column10: Meet me in the western backyard when you are done. Now, let us begin.
column12: 侦察完成后到西面后院处会合，现在开始行动。

column10: MISSION-WORDCOUNT EN:
